name: Playtime Heroes
description:
Five toys must band together to save their friend from the clutches of The Big Brother.

Play with an Xbox 360 Controller:

  • Control with Left Stick
  • Jump with A
  • Attack with X
  • Dash with Left Trigger

Created as a Final Project for Video Game Design and Development at Fanshawe College.

Created by:
  • Scott "The Game Mechanic" Melanson
  • Aaron Ly
  • Courtney Bensette
  • Josh Biemans
  • Caleb Christopher Embleton-Oliver
